    • Method Detail

      • createNewGame

        public java.lang.Long createNewGame(PlayerEntity firstPlayerEntity,
                                    PlayerEntity secondPlayerEntity,
                                    boolean isRanked)
                             throws InvalidRequiredArgumentException,
                                    SamePlayerException
        Creates new Game instance and saves it in database.
        Parameters:
        firstPlayerEntity - FirstPlayerEntity describes first Player in Game.
        secondPlayerEntity - SecondPlayerEntity describes second Player in Game.
        Returns:
        Id of newly created Game.
        Throws:
        InvalidRequiredArgumentException - when players do not have playerType set
        SamePlayerException - when firstPlayer is the same as secondPlayer (which means they have the same color)

      • getGamesToJoin

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getGamesToJoin()
        Returns list of ids of games to join(games where secondPlayer is null)
        Returns:
        list of games to join

      • joinGame

        public void joinGame(java.lang.Long gameId,
                     PlayerEntity secondPlayerEntity)
              throws InvalidRequiredArgumentException,
                     CannotJoinPlayerException,
                     GameNotExistException
        Joins secondPlayer to the Game with gameId
        Parameters:
        gameId - Id of the Game to join
        secondPlayerEntity - SecondPlayerEntity describes Player who wants to join the Game
        Throws:
        InvalidRequiredArgumentException - when Player does not have playerType set
        CannotJoinPlayerException - when Game has already started (there are two players in Game)
        GameNotExistException - when Game with given Game id does not exist

      • getGameEntity

        public GameEntity getGameEntity(java.lang.Long gameId)
        Returns GameEntity with given gameId
        Parameters:
        gameId - Id of the Game
        Returns:
        GameEntity with given gameId, null if such a GameEntity does not exist

      • makeMove

        public MoveResponseDTO makeMove(java.lang.Long gameId,
                                PlayerEntity playerEntity,
                                Position origin,
                                Position destination)
                         throws InvalidRequiredArgumentException,
                                NotPlayerTurnException,
                                GameNotExistException,
                                GameHasFinishedException
        Makes given Move on board.
        Parameters:
        gameId - Id of the Game in which Move has to be made.
        playerEntity - PlayerEntity describes Player who wants to make Move.
        origin - Origin of the Move.
        destination - Destination of the Move.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        InvalidRequiredArgumentException - when Player does not have playerType set
        NotPlayerTurnException - when playerEntity wants to make Move when it is not its turn
        GameNotExistException - when Game with given Game id does not exist
        GameHasFinishedException - when Game with given Game id is finished

      • promote

        public MoveResponseDTO promote(java.lang.Long gameId,
                               PlayerEntity playerEntity,
                               Piece.PieceType pieceType)
                        throws GameNotExistException,
                               InvalidRequiredArgumentException
        Throws:
        GameNotExistException
        InvalidRequiredArgumentException

                            throws GameNotExistException,
                                   NotPlayerTurnException,
                                   GameHasFinishedException
        Throws:

        NotPlayerTurnException
        GameHasFinishedException

      • getBoard

        public java.util.List<PieceDTO> getBoard(java.lang.Long gameId)
                                  throws GameNotExistException
        Gets board from Game.
        Parameters:
        gameId - Id of the Game.
        Returns:
        List of PieceDTO describing Board.
        Throws:
        GameNotExistException - when Game with given Game id does not exist

      • getPossibleMoves

        public java.util.List<Position> getPossibleMoves(java.lang.Long gameId,
                                                 Position position)
        Return possible moves for Piece located on Position.
        Parameters:
        gameId - Id of the Game on which Piece is located.
        position - Postition on which Piece is located.
        Returns:
        List of possible moves.
